string.text: Let us settle this according to the old ways. I challenge you to a duel!
What are your terms?
I expect you to surrender, should you lose!
We shall meet one on one before our armies clash in battle!
I expect you to allow us safe passage!
I accept to meet you in honorable combat.
We shall meet on the field, then.
I think not. Our armies will clash in battle!
I challenge you to a duel!
Very well, we shall test our strengths.
We shall meet on the field, then.
I propose a wager.
How much do you care to bet on your skills?
I accept.
Let's test our skills one on one.
Very well.
Begin the duel
Capture the Enemy
Duel on horseback: ON
Duel on horseback: OFF
Go to battle
You make your preparations to meet your opponent in honorable combat.
You have won the duel!
You have won the duel! However, the dishonorable lord refuses to surrender!
You have lost the duel!
Your relation with {0} has increased to {1}.
Your relation with {0} has decreased to {1}.
You have received {0} denars.
You have lost {0} denars.
You have gained {0} renown and influence.
You have gained {0} renown.
